title: Can I download back the old client?
body: Since I downloaded the new client i have been punished for dodging. What happens is that i cant ban champs because it laggs too much. Also, when I play blind pick games, the chat takes an eternity to load up so i cant ever call quickly a lane! kill me...

replies.body:
You can actually launch right into the Legacy Client from the Beta Client's login screen, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

The client's still in Beta, so there are going to be some bumps along the way until it's ready for everyone's use. Thanks for giving it a try and letting us know what you experienced. ^.^
I press on it and launcher just go away without turning on Legacy Client. I have windows 10 if that changes anything.

Im playing on a mac and it works for me so...
I guess it changes something
